body.para: *** This bug is a duplicate of bug 814306 *** https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/814306

** This bug has been marked a duplicate of bug 814306 path resolving issue: libsoftokn3.so not found, maybe affecting other native
libraries
-- You received this bug notification because you are a member of Ubuntu Bugs, which is subscribed to Ubuntu. https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/821936
